AboutUs.title: About us
AboutUs.Info: Our cigars have been made after a careful selection of wrapper, filler and binder leaves from the Dominican Republic, and produced by expert Dominican cigar rollers.
AccountScreen.UserMessage: Here you can manage your info
SearchScreen.IndicationMessage: Search by type or characteristic, like: Cigar, Pure, etc.
OrderApproved.WorkingMessage: We are working to ship your order, the whole process can take up to a week.
Cookies.DescriptionMessageOne: Cookies and other similar technologies are an essential part of how our web app works. The main goal of cookies is to make your browsing experience easier and more efficient and to improve our services and the web app itself.
Cookies.DescriptionMessageTwo: Cookies are generally configured to respond to actions made by you when requesting services, such as logging in to your account or filling out forms.
Cookies.DescriptionMessageThree: You can configure your browser to block these cookies or alert you when they are present; however, some parts of the Alborghetti web app will not work without them.
